a female worker who

This is a difficult case.  Among

reports from the Ministry of Health that during the 7-day
Tet holiday, the number of emergency medical examinations for
traffic accidents decreased significantly, but
accidents caused by firecrackers doubled compared to the same period last
year.
Last year, the total number of emergency medical examinations related to
traffic accidents was more than 23,000
cases, a decrease of about 12 minutes compared to Tet
2023, while emergencies due to firecrackers
increased by more than 51 minutes during Tet, in addition to the
epidemic situation in the following years.
